name: Smile For Me - Official Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Features:

  • Soundtrack composed by Lucas Saur, and performed with live instruments
  • 14 original tracks featured in Smile For Me
  • 4 bonus tracks, not available in-game!
  • DRM-free mp3 files for your collection!
  • A high resolution album cover image!

Tracklist:

  • PSA
  • Menu "Vibes"
  • Home in the West
  • The Apartments
  • Falling Asleep
  • The Carnival
  • The Lounge - Jazz
  • The Lounge - Dance
  • The Lounge - Film
  • The Lounge - Freak
  • The Terrace
  • Doctor Habit
  • Interlude
  • Platitudes
  • ... plus 4 super secret bonus tracks!

short_description: May your ear-holes rejoice. It’s the esoteric music-scape of Smile For Me, now available on home-DLC. Composedby Lucas Saur and recorded with live instruments, these tunes are sure to put a pep in your step!
